updates.description: The Advanced Search API allows users to perform complex search queries within Global Relay, improving the efficiency of data retrieval and analysis.
updates.automation_value: This update reduces the time spent on manual data search and retrieval, allowing for faster and more efficient data analysis.
updates.business_impact: Improves data retrieval efficiency, leading to faster decision-making and improved business agility.

updates.description: The Workflow Automation Module enables users to automate routine tasks within Global Relay, such as data entry, report generation, and task assignment.
updates.automation_value: This feature eliminates the need for manual task execution, saving users time and reducing the risk of human error.
updates.business_impact: Reduces operational costs and risk of human error, improving overall business efficiency.

updates.description: This enhancement improves the integration between Global Relay and Salesforce, allowing for seamless data sharing and synchronization between the two platforms.
updates.automation_value: This update saves time by eliminating the need for manual data entry and synchronization between Global Relay and Salesforce.
updates.business_impact: Improves data consistency and availability, enhancing customer service and business decision-making.

updates.description: The Automated Reporting Feature allows users to schedule and automate the generation of reports within Global Relay, reducing the time spent on manual report creation.
updates.automation_value: This feature saves time by automating the report generation process, allowing users to focus on more important tasks.
updates.business_impact: Reduces operational costs and improves report availability, enhancing business decision-making and efficiency.

updates.description: This update expands the number of API endpoints available in Global Relay, providing users with more options for data retrieval and manipulation.
updates.automation_value: The expanded API endpoints reduce the time spent on data retrieval and manipulation, allowing for more efficient data analysis and decision making.
updates.business_impact: Enhances data accessibility and manipulation capabilities, improving business agility and decision-making.

results.raw_output:
1. Update Name: Global Relay Advanced Search API
   Release Date: November 15, 2023
   Description: The Advanced Search API allows users to perform complex search queries within Global Relay, improving the efficiency of data retrieval and analysis.
   Automation Value: This update reduces the time spent on manual data search and retrieval, allowing for faster and more efficient data analysis.

2. Update Name: Global Relay Workflow Automation Module
   Release Date: March 10, 2024
   Description: The Workflow Automation Module enables users to automate routine tasks within Global Relay, such as data entry, report generation, and task assignment.
   Automation Value: This feature eliminates the need for manual task execution, saving users time and reducing the risk of human error.

3. Update Name: Global Relay Salesforce Integration Enhancement
   Release Date: July 20, 2024
   Description: This enhancement improves the integration between Global Relay and Salesforce, allowing for seamless data sharing and synchronization between the two platforms.
   Automation Value: This update saves time by eliminating the need for manual data entry and synchronization between Global Relay and Salesforce.

4. Update Name: Global Relay Automated Reporting Feature
   Release Date: January 5, 2025
   Description: The Automated Reporting Feature allows users to schedule and automate the generation of reports within Global Relay, reducing the time spent on manual report creation.
   Automation Value: This feature saves time by automating the report generation process, allowing users to focus on more important tasks.

5. Update Name: Global Relay API Endpoint Expansion
   Release Date: June 15, 2025
   Description: This update expands the number of API endpoints available in Global Relay, providing users with more options for data retrieval and manipulation.
   Automation Value: The expanded API endpoints reduce the time spent on data retrieval and manipulation, allowing for more efficient data analysis and decision making.
